column5: Anyone else have the opportunity to see the Sheepdogs and Sloan at Showplace in Peterborough last night. My wife was diligent in phoning in to win tickets from The Wolf and we had the pleasure of sitting in the second row to watch these two Canadian rock bands. The Sheepdogs rocked the joint and sounded a lot like Lynyrd Skynyrd with their own twist. It was both The Wolf and Sloan's twentieth birthday party. Everything was great, but I found it wierd that The Wolf didn't throw out any t-shirts or hats to the audience.
yer a lucky guy! for sure 2 of my favourite bands.
Yeah, was lucky enough to win some ticket. Front row balcony, both bands put on a great show...

Sloan is a great band...I went to college in Ptbo, bumped into them on the street corner downtown and I said hello, wished I had tickets, sold out venue at the trash, I had 4 tickets in my hand just like that...down to earth guys  also seen them at guelph university, with joel plaskett emergency..they always put up a good show  sounds like another great time
I tried for weeks here to get tickets to the rock 95 party. No luck. IT,S GOING TO BE A BLAST. Shame I, going to mis it.  :wallbash:
